name: Adidas Runners Santa Run
about:
Aerobic Run + Stretching
Add variety and fun to your training with our Fartlek Run + Mobility session! This event combines an energizing Fartlek workout with a focused mobility session to improve your speed, adaptability, and overall flexibility.

Fartlek Run: 
A Swedish term meaning "speed play," this run alternates between bursts of faster running and periods of easy recovery. It’s an unstructured, free-flowing workout that improves endurance, speed, and mental strength.

Ideal for runners of all levels who want to break away from monotony, challenge their pace, and improve their mobility.

name: Adidas Runners Circuit Training + Easy Run
about: Mix things up and elevate your fitness with our Circuit Training + Easy Run session! This event combines high-energy circuit exercises with a relaxed run to build strength, endurance, and overall athletic performance.

name: Adidas Runners Santa Run
about:
Push your limits and build endurance with our Long Run session! This steady-paced run is designed to help you increase mileage, improve stamina, and prepare for longer races or events.

This session is ideal for intermediate and advanced runners, or anyone training for events like 10Ks, half marathons, or marathons.

name: Adidas Runners Speed Session
about:
Take your running to the next level with our Speed Session! This high-intensity workout is designed to improve your pace, power, and overall running efficiency.

Perfect for runners looking to challenge themselves and enhance their speed, whether training for a race or simply looking to push their limits.

name: Adidas Runners WWWR - Ally Special
about:
Celebrate the power of allyship with our With Women We Run (WWWR) - Ally Special session! This unique event invites allies to run alongside women, highlighting the importance of support, inclusion, and shared goals in the running community.

Open to runners of all abilities—whether you’re a seasoned runner or just starting, join us in supporting and celebrating each other.
